snippet.title: Shadowgate Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadowgate is now available on Steam for only $19.99. Expand your adventure with the Special Edition for $29.99 that includes digital delivery of the official soundtrack, the 2015 “World of Shadowgate” calendar, the digital “Art of Shadowgate” book, and more.  Longtime fans who bravely adventured through any of the previous iterations, along with brand new adventurers embarking into this classic realm for the first time will find plenty to love. So grab a torch and traverse the labyrinthine stronghold known as Shadowgate!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/zojoi
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zojoi

Like the Shadowgate Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shadowgategame

Free NES Shadowgate Ring Tones! http://www.zojoi.com/ring-tones/
